definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
see 大鱗大麻哈魚|大鳞大麻哈鱼[da4 lin2 da2 ma2 ha3 yu2]
pinyin: da4 lin2 da2 ma3 ha3 yu2

sentences.english: We must first calculate the horse-power needed to propel the ship.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须首先计算出驱动这艘船需要多大马力。

sentences.english: They want to live on the road.
sentences.chinese: 他们就想睡在大马路上。

sentences.english: The Lord said to him, 'Go back the way you came, and go to the Desert of Damascus. When you get there, anoint Hazael king over Aram.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华对他说，你回去，从旷野往大马色去。

sentences.english: Your nose is like a tower of Lebanon, overlooking Damascus.
sentences.chinese: 你的鼻子彷佛朝大马色的黎巴嫩塔。

sentences.english: Comments and suggestions about MABA and basketball in Malaysia.
sentences.chinese: 关于大马篮总及马来西亚篮运的讨论及意见。

sentences.english: MACC stand for Malaysia Anti-Corruption Commission.
sentences.chinese: 中文就是大马反贪污委员会。

sentences.english: Drop yourself on the sidewalk. As the great Epicurus wrote
sentences.chinese: 那就把你自己扔在大马路上。

sentences.english: No matter what car you drive, you have to appreciate the hot rod.
sentences.chinese: 无论您开什么车，您一定会喜欢高速的大马力汽车。

sentences.english: But they leading him by the hands, brought him to Damascus.
sentences.chinese: 人们牵著他的手，领他进了大马士革。

sentences.english: My name is Salmon, like the fish. First name, Susie.
sentences.chinese: 我姓萨蒙，就是大马哈鱼那个词，名叫苏茜。

sentences.english: So they led him by the hand into Damascus.
sentences.chinese: 有人拉他的手，领他进了大马色。

sentences.english: Eyes are now turning on Damascus and Aleppo.
sentences.chinese: 视线正在向大马士革和阿勒波转移。

sentences.english: Our reporter says fighting is continuing in Demara and that the atmosphere in Bangui is very tense.
sentences.chinese: 记者称大马士革的战斗仍在继续，班基的气氛很紧张。

sentences.english: Long ago, people who were rich or important rode horses that were very tall.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，巨富显要们都骑高头大马。

sentences.english: The brewery had 25 heavy horses delivering beer in London.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒厂有25匹高头大马在伦敦城中运送啤酒。

sentences.english: The stock farm is raising big horses for work in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 这个畜牧场在饲养干农活的高头大马。

definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
